text: I love MoneyLion and how its help me build my credit. They have some awesome benefits such as the loan and the instacash feature. I just wish they were a bank that you could link to accounts.
title: I love MoneyLion and how its help me…

text:
HORRIBLE!!! DO NOT DO BUSINESS WITH THEM!

Do yourself a favor and check their reviews on BBB. They are a SCAM of a company. 

I had a loan, paid it off from my investment account... well due to a glitch in their system it apparently never got paid off. So instead of calling or emailing me to let me know this, they reported me to the credit bureau as 60 days late! As soon as I saw I reached out. They said they needed to escalate the issue to ensure it was a glitch and they would contact me back.

A week later... no one had contacted me. So I called again, same response and they asked me to fill out a dispute form. So I did all of that. 

A week later... still no update. So I went ahead and filed a claim with the BBB... a week later a girl named Jessica contacted me from MoneyLion. I called her back just a few minutes after her voicemail, and emailed her. No response... I tried again the next day. Same thing. Tried again... and FINALLY got ahold of her, she had no excuse as to why she was not responding.

She explained the issue and in order to just get it done I paid the amount, and asked for everything to be emailed. She agreed. Do you think I ever got an email? NOPE. I emailed her asking about it... no response. 

I finally got an email from the BBB with all of the information including the resolution which was to take up to 30 days to fix the credit reporting. Well it has been almost 30 days now, and initially they reported the paid in full but did not fix the late items. And NOW they just changed it again and it says 901-119 days late!!!! They have dropped my scored another 30 points!

I have been on hold 33 minutes now to speak to a supervisor... and the girl before told me... oh well we can have you fill out the dispute form and wait. ARE YOU KIDDING ME! They are messing with my life now! I was disqualified for a house because of their error on my credit!
title: HORRIBLE!!

text: Been using MoneyLion for several years now and while you have to applaud their creativity, their app, products and customer service is brutally bad. Their Instacash takes over a week to reflect on your account despite having cleared your checking account, their loans take weeks or months to pay off, there are various unscheduled debits for membership and loan repayments that occur randomly and without warning, their 'shake the coinbag' is the most artificial stupidity ever created and their suggestions for loans and other financial products don't lead anywhere and nothing that you can not research yourself. So glad I never opened a checking account with them; once bitten, twice shy. STEER WELL CLEAR. You have been warned!
title: Avoid like the plague!

text: This isn't really a real bank, it can't be. First this place is being run by children that don't know anything about customer service or how real banking works. You have to go through hell and high water to get a human being on the phone and when you do just read from a script. They are no help what so ever. DO NOT BANK HERE!!
title: This isn't really a real bank

text: They are a scam! I took out a credit building loan of $500. In order to have that loan you must pay a weekly membership fee. I use the same banking info for both. They have no problems taking out the weekly membership fee but will not accept my loan payments so now its messing my credit up badly instead of helping anything. Do NOT trust this conpany

consumer.displayName: SYSTEM KONTROL PRO DUC SHUN HAWAII

text: I've had a MoneyLion Plus membership since July of 2018.  I've ran into several issues over the course of my membership and it has always been extremely difficult to get problems resolved.  Hold times are always extremely long and the agents answering the calls have to send everything up for review.  I've been on hold for 20 minutes today to discuss an issue I'm having with the app, but I think this is just going to be the call to put an end to the membership.  Do yourself a favor, if you're looking to build credit, use a Self loan or a secured credit card instead.
title: A problem around every corner.

reply.message: Hi there, Justin Decker. We apologize to hear about your experience with MoneyLion. We would like to learn more so we can make improvements to our product and customer care process. Please use the link below to schedule a callback time that's convenient for you: https://moneylion.youcanbook.me/ Thank you.

text: This app/company is back to its old way, of NOT WORKING. Customer service line is a joke. The app won't accept my debit card, for the cash advance (which I've done a ton of times before), and I even had an error message/issue when trying scan my card or use the "transfer funds" option. I don't understand how updates, before/after installation, make things worse? Get it together, guys. I'll change back to 4 stats, once it works. You still managed to process my payment for the loan though - without issues
title: This app/company is back to its old…

text:
I have explained this situation to countless customer representatives at Money Lion. Some of the names include: Aron R., Alvin Villasana, Levy D, Jane (who left the chat when I showed her proof that the loan was paid off), etc. I have been dealing with this since February and have filed a complaint with BBB after dealing with the runaround and false information provided. 

Every single time, I speak to a customer representative, they admittedly state it’s a “technical error” and they will be getting this to either 1. Their engineers or 2. Specialized team but it never gets resolved. My loan is still showing outstanding when I have already paid it off. You impacted my credit (while I’m in the process of getting a mortgage) by inaccurately reporting me late when I never missed a payment. I need the app updated not in 30 days, not next week, but now. I have called them to get it escalated countless times, only to be put on hold or hung up on.  I do already see a lawsuit was filed against your company in Virginia and another one in California for excessive fees. Please do not fall for the CreditBullder Plus loan like I did.
title: Loan was paid off on 1/6 but they are falsifying information

reply.message: Hi there, Nika Perkins. We apologize to hear about your experience with MoneyLion. We've successfully sent a correction to all corresponding credit bureaus to rectify or update the error made on your credit score/reporting. Please do allow 7 to 10 business days for it to be fully updated. Should you encounter any issues, you may reach out to us directly at 801-252-4427 or through chat on your MoneyLion mobile app. Thank you!

text:
I wouldn’t recommend this app to anyone at all, lack of communication , there reps don’t know the answers to you’re question. They never “call you back”
I used a “credit builder plus loan” and from what the gentlemen over the phone told me after I said “I applied for the loan for 1000 bucks it only deposited 80 bucks into my account?” He then says “well sir in order to access the full amount of $1,000 you have to pay the amount due which is $80.00. So I went ahead and quote on quote said ok sir I’d like to pay that 80 dollars to access that full amount he then proceeds with the transaction and says it will post within 3-5 business days. 3 days go by my bank contacts me saying they blocked my account for “fraudulent activity”. Turns out that “gentlemen” from money lion charged my account 1000 bucks and my bank blocked it (thank god) and so I then called back and they said you guys tried charging my account blah blah and all she had to say was “SIR THERES NOTHIHNG WE CAN DO ABOUT IT PLEASE PAY THE AMOUNT OF 1000 OR SET UP A PAYMENT WITH COLLECTIONS” I’m like PAY YOU 1000 BUCKS FOR WHAT!!!? PLEse anyone DO NOT USE THERE SERVICES!!!! MY CREDIT SCORE DROPPED 51 POINTS AND IM IN THE MIDDLE OF A LAW SUIT AGAINST THEN FOR FRAUDULENT ACTIVITY TO MY ACCOUNT!!
title: DO NOT USE THIS APP IT DAMAGES YOURE CREDIT!!!

text:
Worst customer service imaginable phone also. Overall you are a terrible bank that has representatives that do everything but actually accuse you of deception. You are so far away from any type of decent customer service it is unbelievable that you are still in business. But I will make sure and let all of my friends and co-workers what type of service you provide don't worry. Over 1000 people between social accounts is not a lot but those 1000 have friends and sometimes the right post just goes viral maybe not mine might be a friend's or maybe their friends entirely possible the way it's been lately I'm a small business you are large and pay trust pilot so your star ratings are fake. Why would anyone do business with you when majority of the reviews are 1 star yet your overall is a4? Now we know to have a paid account with trustpilot .
Also they have my money in limbo while they decide whether I'm a scammer or not. Meanwhile they know I'm sitting at a gas station and out of gas. Excellent customer service NOT!!!
title: Worst customer service imaginable phone…

text: This company is complete and utter lowlife scum trash. you guys refuse to answer the freaking phone you guys do not care about your customers whatsoever. I received a $500 loan at 5.99% interest. not only did you guys screw up my bank account information but I got multiple 30-day late notices on my account and you guys continue to not answer the fu#king phone!!! and then when I finally got ahold of you guys you guys corrected my bank account information after you guys admitted messing up on a recorded line. I paidy that loan off in full which led to me having a zero balance. it is now may of 2020 and I continue to get 30 to 60 to 90 to 120 day late notices on my credit bureaus you guys have created two or three different new accounts under my name!!! I do not have an account with moneylion anymore!! I filed a cbfd claim to the credit bureaus and money lions response was they made a mistake and they would reverse the late which they haven't and I continue to receive late notices and somehow now I have a $19 balance with them even though I have them on a recorded line stating back in October I have a zero balance and I do not have an account with them. I continue to try to call them sit on hold for 30 minutes and then I get a recording stating we're not available confirm your phone number and someone will call you back in 30 minutes to an hour and no one has ever done that, I've tried calling 15 times since October 2019 I get the same response no answer  BS recording this company is utter fu#cking trash!!!!!
title: This company is complete and utter…

text: Wish I could rate a negative...This company is a scam, they take your money and put it into an account you didn't ask for, then, when you try and pay off the loan, they say they don't accept your bank or card information. Now this stupid company will be on my credit because they won't let me pay it off.
title: Wish I could rate a negative...This…
